esqlQuery.esql:
FROM metrics-*, *:metrics-*
| WHERE process.executable RLIKE ".*[Ee]lastic.*[Aa]gent.*" AND agent.name NOT LIKE "*agentless*"
| STATS restart_count = COUNT_DISTINCT(process.cpu.start_time) BY host.name, process.name, bucket(@timestamp,5 minute) 
| WHERE restart_count > 10
| STATS MAX(restart_count) BY host.name, process.name
